<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.02
</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> System

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets the detail texture map blend pars. Allows for smooth transition between detailed and undetailed terrain texture at distance. If noDetail &gt; fullDetail, the texture detail will incur smooth transition in the area between the thresholds. If noDetail &lt;<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> fullDetail there will be obvious visible edge between texture detail changes at fullDetail distance.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''setDetailMapBlendPars''' [fullDetail, noDetail]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [fullDetail, noDetail]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> fullDetail: [[Number]] - threshold distance in metres up to which the terrain will have full texture detail

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> noDetail: [[Number]] - threshold distance in metres after which the texture detail will be switched off

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[setDetailMapBlendPars]] [20, 50];</code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[setDetailMapBlendPars]] ([[if]] ([[currentWeapon]] [[player]] [[in]] [
	"Binocular",
	"Rangefinder",
	"Laserdesignator"
]) [[then]] [
	{[300,600]},
	{[20,50]}
]);
</code>
</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> Reset to default: <code>[[setDetailMapBlendPars]] [-1, -1];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setViewDistance]], [[viewDistance]], [[setTerrainGrid]], [[getObjectViewDistance]], [[setObjectViewDistance]]
</value></part></template>
